compendiumConfig.name: Compendium Configuration
compendiumConfig.hint: Configure which compendiums to include in the search results
compendiumConfig.label: Configure Compendiums

gmOnly.name: GM Only
gmOnly.hint: Only the GM can open the Spotlight Omnisearch

darkMode.name: Dark Mode
darkMode.hint: Use a dark theme for the Spotlight Omnisearch

compactMode.name: Compact Mode
compactMode.hint: Use a compact layout for the Spotlight Omnisearch. This will hide descriptions and reduce size of the search results

clickToDismiss.name: Click to Dismiss
clickToDismiss.hint: Click outside the Spotlight Omnisearch to dismiss it

saveLastSearch.name: Save Last Search
saveLastSearch.hint: Save the last search query and results for the next time the Spotlight Omnisearch is opened

useHistory.name: Use Search History
useHistory.hint: Use the search history to suggest previous searches

enableCtrlSpace.name: Enable Ctrl + Space
enableCtrlSpace.hint: Enable the Ctrl + Space hotkey to open the Spotlight Omnisearch - Since this binding bypasses the Core Foundry keybindings system, it will work inside input fields and text areas.

position.name: Position
position.hint: Set the position of the Spotlight Omnisearch on the screen

alwaysOnTop.name: Always On Top
alwaysOnTop.hint: Keep the Spotlight Omnisearch on top of other windows

spotlightWidth.name: Spotlight Width
spotlightWidth.hint: Set the width of the Spotlight Omnisearch in pixels

showImages.name: Show Images
showImages.hint: Display images in search results. Images will increase loading times for the results and may result in stuttering depending on the number of results and the size of the images.

searchFiles.name: Search Files
searchFiles.hint: Include file search results (Requires File Index from the Dig Down module)

searchSettings.name: Search Settings
searchSettings.hint: Include game settings in search results

fullCompendiumJournalIndex.name: Full Compendium Journal Index
fullCompendiumJournalIndex.hint: Include pages and headers in compendium journal indexing. This will increase the initialization time of the index. It's recommended to disable this if you have a large number of journal compendiums.

useMetricForLights.name: Use Metric for Lights
useMetricForLights.hint: Use metric units quick light effects

notifications.timer-gm: Only the GM can start a timer
notifications.tracker-gm: Only the GM can use the success/failure tracker

help.name: Help
list: Shift + Space to open the Spotlight Omnisearch
Escape or Click outside (optional, default off) to close the Spotlight Omnisearch
Press Enter to confirm first result
Shift / Alt + Enter to execute the first or second actions of the first result
Special commands: help, note, roll, timer, tracker, counter or type a Math expression to calculate

restore.name: Restore
restore.description: Restore the selected token(s) to full health

reindex.name: Index
reindex.description: Rebuild the search index for the Spotlight Omnisearch
